about_the_game:
Uncover the truth

Step into the fractured reality of the Tragedy at Ashville Lane, a psychological horror experience that blurs the line between the seen and the imagined. Set within the oppressive walls of a creaking, labyrinthine house, the game immerses players in the unraveling psyche of a man struggling with inner demons that take a hauntingly real form.

The house is alive with chilling sounds, shadowy figures, and an atmosphere that shifts with the protagonist's fragile state of mind. Solve intricate puzzles, uncover hidden memories, and tread carefully as every creak of the floorboards might herald the arrival of something you can’t fully understand.

The experience is enhanced by a fully interactable inventory and environment, where every object might hold a clue—or a chilling revelation. Carefully inspect your surroundings, collect items, and piece them together to solve intricate puzzles that are essential to progressing through the story. The house itself feels like a living entity, with hidden secrets waiting to be uncovered. Every drawer opened, every book examined, and every object picked up could hold the key to unlocking the protagonist’s mind—or unleashing deeper horrors. Stay vigilant, as the environment is as much an ally as it is a threat.

The house is alive with chilling sounds, shadowy figures, and an atmosphere that shifts with the protagonist's fragile state of mind. Solve intricate puzzles, uncover hidden memories, and tread carefully as every creak of the floorboards might herald the arrival of something you can’t fully understand.

The experience is enhanced by a fully interactable inventory and environment, where every object might hold a clue—or a chilling revelation. Carefully inspect your surroundings, collect items, and piece them together to solve intricate puzzles that are essential to progressing through the story. Every drawer opened, every book examined, and every object picked up could hold the key to unlocking the protagonist’s mind—or unleashing deeper horrors. Stay vigilant, as the environment is as much an ally as it is a threat.
name: Tragedy at Ashville Lane

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD 2.5 GHz or superior
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Any DirectX 11 or 12 compatible card
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Dive into a psychological horror experience and try to uncover the mystery at Ashville Lane. Step into the shadows of your fears and face them to figure out what happened that day. Survival is your only option and remaining hidden is a must.
